justification: Vendor claims Power BI 'transforms raw data into interactive and visually immersive insights,' supporting analysis for decision-making, directly relating to the requirement for insight derivation in a business user-focused interface. However, there is only general mention of 'interactive and visually immersive insights,' lacking specific examples of actions, real-time capabilities, or multi-persona support, resulting in partial—not fully substantiated—alignment with the Ability.
ability: The ability to analyze stored data (records) to derive insights and actions in a business user focused visual interface
